mapper.insert: insert into tbl_participate_event (participate_no, event_title, event_start_date, event_end_date, userno, event_no) values (seq_participate_event_participateno.nextval, #{event_title}, #{event_start_date}, #{event_end_date}, #{userno}, #{event_no})
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_participate_event
order by event_no desc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
